volatility_30d_rolling.reason: Daily data for January 2025 does not exist yet (current date: 2025-01-17). Cannot calculate until 30 trading days have passed.

precio_cierre.description: Original dataset overestimated closing price by $22.57

retorno.description: Original dataset underestimated annual return by 20.43 percentage points (actual 29.48% vs reported 9.05%)

discrepancy_analysis.root_cause: Original dataset appears to use incorrect reference dates or data points not matching Yahoo Finance year-end 2024 values

variables.P_t: Price at end of current period (2024-12-31)
variables.P_{t-1}: Price at end of prior period (2023-12-31)

annual_return.interpretation: Total return from holding AAPL throughout calendar year 2024

formula_steps: Step 1: Calculate daily returns: r_t = ln(P_t / P_{t-1})
Step 2: Compute standard deviation of last 30 daily returns
Step 3: Annualize by multiplying by √252 (trading days per year)
volatility_rolling_30d.data_requirement_note: REQUIRES 30 DAILY OBSERVATIONS - NOT POSSIBLE FOR FUTURE DATES
volatility_rolling_30d.why_impossible: Historical data only exists up to present. Cannot calculate rolling metrics for dates where data doesn't exist. Would require data from 2025-02-26 or later.

general_principles.no_forwardlooking_data: Financial data is inherently backward-looking. Cannot calculate metrics requiring future data.
general_principles.data_freshness: As of analysis date, complete 2024 data exists. January 2025 data is partial/incomplete.
general_principles.verification: All values verified against Yahoo Finance official data

key_findings: AAPL delivered strong 29.48% return in 2024, significantly outperforming the 9.05% reported in original dataset
Original dataset had material errors in all three key metrics (price, return, ATH)
Rolling volatility calculation is impossible until sufficient daily data accumulates
